summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the south one-half of Lot 9, Block 15, Highland Park Addition; the west 50 feet of Lot 1, Block 10, Gilman's Addition; a portion of Tract 14, Ravenna Springs Park; the easterly 60 feet of Lots 6 and 7, Block 80, Terry's 2nd Addition; and the south 20 feet of the east 60 feet of Lot 5 and the east 60 feet of Lot 6, Block 317, A. A. Denny's Broadway Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-232 and 17-179, respectively.
